Ruth Ndulu Maingi (a mụrụ na 22 Mee 1983), bụ onye Kenya na-eme ihe nkiri. A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri 18 Hours, The Distant Boat na Midlife Crisis

A mụrụ Ruth na 22 Mee afọ 1983 na Machakos, Kenya dịka nwa nke anọ n'ime ezinụlọ nke ụmụnne isii. Ọ gara Kathiani High School na Township Muslim Primary School na Machakos maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị na praịmarị n'otu n'otu
Ọ gụsịrị diplọma na mkpuchi mgbe ọ gụsịrị ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị.
Ruth malitere ọrụ ya dịka onye na-agba egwu mgbe ahụ, o mechara gbanwee gaa na nka iji rụọ ọrụ ma sonye na Kenya National Theatre Performing Arts School ruo afọ abụọ
N'afọ 2007, ọ sonyeere Kigezi Ndoto Musical Theatre Performances
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2008, ọ kwagara India ma mee ihe nkiri maka Sauti Kimya na Githaa
N'afọ 2011, o mere ihe nkiri izizi ya na ihe nkiri The Marshal of Finland ma n'otu afọ ahụ, a họpụtara ya maka ọrụ ndu na usoro telivishọn Lies that Bind, nke mere ihe nkiri mbụ ya na telivishọn
N'ime usoro a, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Salome', nwunye nke atọ na ezi ịhụnanya Richard Juma, na nwunye nke atọ
Mgbe ahụ n'afọ 2013, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri Swahili a ma ama Mama Duka na ọrụ aha ya. Maka ọrụ ya, e mechara kwanyere ya ùgwù na 2014 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards
Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ukwuu dịka onye nkuzi na usoro telivishọn The Team, ya na Media Focus on Africa nke Dreamcatcher mepụtara
N'afọ 2014, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri abụọ: The Next East African Film Maker na Orphan N'afọ 2018, o mere Nollywood nke mbụ na ihe nkiri Family First nke Lancelot Imasuen duziri.
